description:
Machamp is a Pokémon that belongs to Giovanni but was given to Jessie whilst she along with James and Meowth looked after Viridian City Gym in his absence.
Jessie order Machamp to attack Ash`s Squirtle and Ash realised that the podium he was standing on was rigged to shock him when his Pokémon was attacked. After getting up to his feet after the shock Ash switched Pokémon to Bulbasaur and Jessie switched to Kingler.
name: Kairiky (Sakaki)
